hymn.title: When we're kind to others
hymn.chords: | C - - - | Dm - G - | C - Am - | Dm7 G7 C - |

layout.singingstanza: When we're kind to oth -- ers, When we're kind to oth -- ers, When we're kind to oth -- ers, God is glad.

lyrics.stanza: When we're kind to others, When we're kind to others, When we're kind to others, God is glad.
